They are typically dusted with powdered sugar for a sweet, light finish, and often served with butter or maple syrup.	<>	Pancakes are made from flour, milk, eggs, and butter, cooked on a griddle or pan until golden-brown, and dusted with powdered sugar for a sweet finish.	<>	Pancakes are golden-brown, fluffy, and dusted with powdered sugar, cooked by frying or baking, with a slightly crispy exterior and soft, moist interior. Ingredients include flour, eggs, milk, and butter, often seasoned with vanilla and maple syrup.
/food-101/images/pancakes/2649740.jpg			Pancakes are a breakfast or brunch dish made from a mixture of flour, eggs, milk, and butter, cooked on a griddle or frying pan. They are typically golden brown, fluffy, and served with toppings such as fresh berries, powdered sugar, and syrup. The image shows a stack of golden pancakes topped with fresh blackberries and strawberries, dusted with powdered sugar, on a white plate, accompanied by a bowl of syrup and a dark background.	<>	Pancakes are light, fluffy, and golden-brown, topped with fresh berries, powdered sugar, and served with a side of berry sauce, showcasing a classic breakfast treat.	<>	The pancakes are golden-brown, fluffy, and topped with powdered sugar, fresh blackberries, blueberries, and sliced strawberries, served with a side of berry sauce, cooked on a griddle or pan.	<>	Pancakes are fluffy, golden-brown, and topped with fresh berries and powdered sugar, cooked on a griddle, and presented on a white plate with a small bowl of jam on the side.	<>	Pancakes are golden-brown, fluffy, and stacked on a plate, topped with powdered sugar, fresh strawberries, blueberries, and blackberries. They are cooked using a griddle or frying pan, achieving a crispy exterior and soft interior, and are served with a side of berry compote.
/food-101/images/pancakes/3432007.jpg			Pancakes are fluffy, golden-brown, and dusted with powdered sugar, served with fresh blueberries and syrup. They are cooked by frying in a pan until golden on both sides. The plate holds two perfectly cooked pancakes with a shiny, syrupy topping and scattered blueberries for a fresh, fruity touch.	<>	Pancakes are made by frying or baking a thin, flat batter of flour, eggs, milk, and butter. They are golden brown on the outside, soft and fluffy on the inside, and dusted with powdered sugar. A small pitcher of maple syrup or jam is often served alongside. They are typically topped with fresh berries, such as blueberries or raspberries, adding a vibrant touch to the dish.	<>	Pancakes are golden-brown, fluffy, and topped with powdered sugar and fresh blueberries. They are served with a small pitcher of syrup and are cooked by frying or baking until crispy on the edges and soft in the middle.	<>	Pancakes are fluffy, golden-brown, dusted with powdered sugar, and garnished with fresh blueberries and butter. They are typically cooked on a griddle or frying pan, and served hot with syrup or butter.	<>	Pancakes are a breakfast dish made from a batter of flour, eggs, milk, and butter, cooked on a griddle or frying pan, often topped with powdered sugar, fresh berries, and butter, creating a visually appealing stack with a golden-brown exterior and fluffy interior.
